item.title: Version 0.2.2
item.description:
Ora Browser v0.2.2

Changes since last release:

Features

  • Feature/global tracker for sidebar (#98) — AryanRogye
  • Feature: allow middle click to open link in new tab (#88) — Omar Sánchez

Fixes

  • fix: update favicon fetching URLs to include Google favicon service — Kenenisa Alemayehu

Chores

  • chore: remove unnecessary exit statement from release script — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • chore: Enhance release script with changelog generation and HTML export — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • chore: undo to vertical scrollview — yonaries
  • chore!: bump deployment target to macOS 15 — yonaries

Other

  • Update Wiki link to point to GitHub page — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • Update to v0.2.1 — Kenenisa Alemayehu
  • ui: apply concentric rectangle on tabs — yonaries
  • Add new Shape that conditionally uses ConcentricRectangle on 26+ (#83) — Joe McLaughlin
  • refactor: moved sidbar urlbar to container view — yonaries
